1: <mistake>zhing</mistake> yon tan <mistake>shes/ chos</mistake> shes rab zhi bkra shis <mistake>'byung//bkra</mistake> shis kun gyi bkra shis <mistake>pa//grags</mistake> <mistake>po</mistake> dpal mo snyan pa <mistake>dge/ dbugs</mistake> 'byin chen po dga' ston <mistake>ce//dga'</mistake> ba chen po rol pa <mistake>che//zhakunr</mistake> <mistake>ste</mistake>
2: rim gro phun sum <mistake>tshogs//rab</mistake> <mistake>tu</mistake> dga' ba grags bdag <mistake>dpal//mchog</mistake> ldan mchog sbyin gtso bo <mistake>ste// skyabs</mistake> kyi dam pa skyabs su <mistake>'os//rab</mistake> mchog 'jigs pa chen <mistake>po'i</mistake> <mistake>dga//'jigs</mistake> pa ma lus sel
3: ba <mistake>po//gtsg</mistake> <mistake>phud</mistake> phud <mistake>phu</mistake> <mistake>ral</mistake> <mistake>pa</mistake> <mistake>can //rol</mistake> pa mgo reg cod pan <mistake>ldan//gdong</mistake> lnga gtsug phud lnga dang <mistake>ldan//zur</mistake> phud lnga dang ldan <mistake>pa'i</mistake> <mistake>thod//mgo</mistake> zlum brtul zhugs chen po <mistake>'chang//tshangs</mistake> par <mistake>spbyod</mistake> pa
4: <mistake>btul</mistake> zhugs mchog / dka' thub mthar <mistake>byin</mistake> dka' thub <mistake>ce//khrus</mistake> ldan <mistake>go'u</mistake> ta ma <mistake>mchog /bram</mistake> <mistake>z</mistake> <mistake>tshangs</mistake> pa <mistake>tshangs</mistake> pa <mistake>rig /tshangs</mistake> par mya ngan 'das <mistake>pa thob//gral</mistake> ba thar pa rnam grol <mistake>lus//rnam</mistake> grol <mistake>zhig</mistake>
5: zhi <mistake>zba</mistake> <mistake>nyid //mya</mistake> <mistake>ran</mistake> 'das zhi mya <mistake>gan</mistake> <mistake>'das//legs</mistake> <mistake>par</mistake> nges 'byung mthar byed <mistake>pa//bde</mistake> <mistake>dang</mistake> sdug bsngal mthar byed <mistake>gnas//'dod</mistake> chags bral <mistake>pba</mistake> brtags pa <mistake>zad//thub</mistake> pa med pa <mistake>dp</mistake> med <mistake>pa//gsal</mistake>
6: min mi snang gos pa <mistake>med// cha</mistake> med kun 'gro khyab pa po // phra mos <mistake>on</mistake> zag pa <mistake>med //rdul</mistake> med rdul bral dri ma <mistake>med//nyes</mistake> pa spangs pa skyon med <mistake>pa//shin</mistake> du rab sad rnam sad <mistake>bdag /thams</mistake> cang ye shes
7: kun rig <mistake>mchog /rnam</mistake> par shes pa'i chos nyid <mistake>'das//ye</mistake> shes gnyis med tshul 'chang <mistake>ba// rnam</mistake> <mistake>par</mistake> rtog med lhun gyis <mistake>grub//dus</mistake> gsum <mistake>sangs</mistake> rgyas las byed <mistake>pa//sangs</mistake> rgyas thog ma <mistake>tha ma</mistake> <mistake>med/</mistake>
8: <mistake>dadg</mistake> <mistake>po'i</mistake> <mistake>sangs</mistake> rgyas ris med <mistake>pa/ye</mistake> shes mig gcig dri ma <mistake>med//ye</mistake> shes lus can de bzhin <mistake>gshogs// tshig</mistake> <mistake>gi</mistake> <mistake>dbang</mistake> phyug smra ba <mistake>che// spra</mistake> ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i <mistake>rgyal//smra</mistake> ba'i dam pa mchog gi
